Package controller

Class LoginCtrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.LoginCtrl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class LoginCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is responsible for the functionality of the "Login" controller.

      This method writes the login activity of every login attempt to a text file.

      This method will shift the focus to the Submit button.

        public void onActionSubmit​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method will call the validateLogin method.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - object to trigger actions
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an input or output exception occurred

      • validateLogin

        public void validateLogin​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent,
                          java.lang.String systemDialog)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        This method will validate the login information for the username and password. Additionally this method also contains code to set up an alert for any appointment within 15 minutes of login. Code also calls loginWriter method.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - object to trigger actions
        systemDialog - The string passed to the System.out.println() function.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an input or output exception occurred

      • loginWriter

        public void loginWriter​(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password,
                        boolean isSuccessful)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This method writes the login activity of every login attempt to a text file.
        Parameters:
        username - object to trigger actions
        password - The string passed to the System.out.println() function.
        isSuccessful - The string passed to the System.out.println() function.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an input or output exception occurred
